title: Katie Price 'thrown out of club' after partying with ex Dane Bowers
text:
Katie and Dane are hanging out together again (Picture: Rex/Getty)

Katie Price was seen partying with ex-boyfriend Dane Bowers before being ‘thrown out of a London club by bouncers’ and it suddenly feels like 2000 all over again.

The Pricey was seen at Soho hotspot Jakata on Thursday night to support the launch of Dane’s new band Boyz On Block, which also includes Phats & Small singer Ben Ofoedu, Boyzone’s Shane Lynch and Abz Love from 5ive.

But sources inside the club have claimed that Katie was a ‘total nightmare’ inside the venue, attempting to take over the decks from the DJ and ‘sneaking behind the bar’ for drinks.

Wearing a short black mini dress with over-the-knee white boots, Katie was pictured in the venue posing with fans and dancing but she was also seen wearing purple headphones behind the DJ booth – and in several pictures, her ex Dane can be seen looking very unimpressed.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘She was a total nightmare,’ claimed insiders at the party.

‘She seemed determined to make the night about herself – rampaging around the place and demanding shots of Limoncello. Katie even went up to Shane Lynch and tried to grab the mic off him and snuck behind the bar to take drinks when the staff wasn’t looking.’

The boyz performing on stage (Picture: Jakata)

Katie could be seen side of stage on Insta stories shared of the evening (Picture: Charlotte Sofia Rose)

‘Everyone was really excited when she turned up – but by the end, enough was enough and she had to go,’ the source told The Sun.

Dane and Katie dated for two years between 1998 and 2000 but have stayed in touch.

Metro.co.uk has contacted reps for Katie for comment.

Katie’s antics come days after the reality star was pictured leaving ex-boyfriend Kris Boyson’s home with sources claiming the pair’s romance is back – and he’s even moved back into her home.

The pair split in the summer amid allegations she had cheated on him with Charles Drury, a builder who was working on her home – whom she has now reportedly cheated on with Kris – but now insiders close to Pricey have suggested that the pair are ‘officially back on’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Yes, it’s a tangled web Katie has been weaving.

Pals of Katie’s told Metro.co.uk that she knew she had ‘some explaining to do’ after she was pictured sneaking out of her ex-boyfriend Kris’s house after spending the night.

But now it has been claimed that Kris has ‘taken her back and they’re already moving some of his things back into the house’.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.
